The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of one that <S%H7121>crieth<s%>, <S%H6437>Prepare<s%> ye in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; make <S%H3474>level<s%> in the <S%H6160>desert<s%> a <S%H4546>highway<s%> for our <S%H430>God<s%>.

Every <S%H1516>valley<s%> shall be <S%H5375>exalted<s%>, and every <S%H2022>mountain<s%> and <S%H1389>hill<s%> shall be made <S%H8213>low<s%>; and the <S%H6121>uneven<s%> shall be made <S%H4334>level<s%>, and the rough <S%H7406>places<s%> a <S%H1237>plain<s%>:

and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall be <S%H1540>revealed<s%>, and all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> it <S%H3162>together<s%>; for the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath spoken <S%H1696>it<s%>.

The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of one <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H7121>Cry<s%>. And one <S%H559>said<s%>, What shall I <S%H7121>cry<s%>? All <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is <S%H2682>grass<s%>, and all the <S%H2617>goodliness<s%> thereof is as the <S%H6731>flower<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>.

The <S%H2682>grass<s%> <S%H3001>withereth<s%>, the <S%H6731>flower<s%> <S%H5034>fadeth<s%>, because the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5380>bloweth<s%> upon <S%H403>it<s%>; surely the <S%H5971>people<s%> is <S%H2682>grass<s%>.
The <S%H2682>grass<s%> <S%H3001>withereth<s%>, the <S%H6731>flower<s%> <S%H5034>fadeth<s%>; but the <S%H1697>word<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%>.

O thou that tellest good <S%H1319>tidings<s%> to <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, get thee <S%H5927>up<s%> on a <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%>; O thou that tellest good <S%H1319>tidings<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, lift <S%H7311>up<s%> thy <S%H6963>voice<s%> with <S%H3581>strength<s%>; lift it <S%H7311>up<s%>, be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%>; <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H430>Behold<s%>, your God!

Behold <S%H136><s%>, the Lord <S%H136>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> as a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H2220>one<s%>, and his arm will <S%H4910>rule<s%> for <S%H7939>him<s%>: Behold, his reward is with <S%H6468>him<s%>, and his recompense before <S%H6440>him<s%>.

He will <S%H7462>feed<s%> his <S%H5739>flock<s%> like a <S%H7462>shepherd<s%>, he will <S%H6908>gather<s%> the <S%H2922>lambs<s%> in his <S%H2220>arm<s%>, and <S%H5375>carry<s%> them in his <S%H2436>bosom<s%>, and will gently <S%H5095>lead<s%> those that have their <S%H5763>young<s%>.

Who hath <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> in the hollow of his <S%H8168>hand<s%>, and meted <S%H8505>out<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> with the <S%H2239>span<s%>, and <S%H3557>comprehended<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> in a <S%H7991>measure<s%>, and <S%H8254>weighed<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> in <S%H6425>scales<s%>, and the <S%H1389>hills<s%> in a <S%H3976>balance<s%>?
Who hath <S%H8505>directed<s%> the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, or being his <S%H376>counsellor<s%> hath taught <S%H3045>him<s%>?

With whom took he <S%H3289>counsel<s%>, and who <S%H995>instructed<s%> <S%H3925>him<s%>, and taught him in the <S%H734>path<s%> of <S%H4941>justice<s%>, and <S%H3925>taught<s%> him <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>, and <S%H3045>showed<s%> to him the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H8394>understanding<s%>?

Behold <S%H1471><s%>, the nations are as a <S%H4752>drop<s%> of a <S%H1805>bucket<s%>, and are <S%H2803>accounted<s%> as the small <S%H7834>dust<s%> of the <S%H3976>balance<s%>: <S%H5190>Behold<s%>, he taketh up the <S%H339>isles<s%> as a very little <S%H1851>thing<s%>.
And <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> is <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H1767>sufficient<s%> to <S%H1197>burn<s%>, nor the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> thereof <S%H1767>sufficient<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>.

To whom then will ye <S%H1819>liken<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>? or what <S%H1823>likeness<s%> will ye compare unto <S%H6186>him<s%>?

The <S%H6459>image<s%>, a <S%H2796>workman<s%> hath <S%H5258>cast<s%> <S%H6884>it<s%>, and the goldsmith <S%H7554>overlayeth<s%> it with <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H6884>casteth<s%> for it <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H7577>chains<s%>.

Have ye not <S%H3045>known<s%>? have yet not <S%H8085>heard<s%>? hath it not been <S%H5046>told<s%> you from the <S%H7218>beginning<s%>? have ye not <S%H995>understood<s%> from the <S%H4146>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>?

It is he that <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> above the <S%H2329>circle<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof are as <S%H2284>grasshoppers<s%>; that stretcheth <S%H5186>out<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> as a <S%H1852>curtain<s%>, and spreadeth them <S%H4969>out<s%> as a <S%H168>tent<s%> to dwell <S%H3427>in<s%>;

Yea <S%H5193><s%>, they have not been planted; <S%H2232>yea<s%>, they have not been sown; <S%H1503>yea<s%>, their stock hath not taken <S%H8327>root<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>: moreover he <S%H5398>bloweth<s%> upon <S%H3001>them<s%>, and they wither, and the <S%H5591>whirlwind<s%> <S%H5375>taketh<s%> them away as <S%H7179>stubble<s%>.
To whom then will ye <S%H1819>liken<s%> <S%H7737>me<s%>, that I should be equal to <S%H559>him<s%>? saith the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%>.

Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> on <S%H4791>high<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%> who hath <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H3318>these<s%>, that bringeth out their <S%H6635>host<s%> by <S%H4557>number<s%>; he <S%H7121>calleth<s%> them all by <S%H8034>name<s%>; by the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of his <S%H202>might<s%>, and for that he is <S%H533>strong<s%> in <S%H3581>power<s%>, not <S%H376>one<s%> is <S%H5737>lacking<s%>.

Why <S%H559>sayest<s%> <S%H3290>thou<s%>, O Jacob, and <S%H1696>speakest<s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, My <S%H1870>way<s%> is <S%H5641>hid<s%> from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and the <S%H4941>justice<s%> due to me is passed <S%H5674>away<s%> from my <S%H430>God<s%>?
